thread.title: Man and toddler are shot dead in Facebook on Facebook Live in Chicago | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man and toddler are shot dead in Facebook on Facebook Live in Chicago | Metro News

author: Jimmy Nsubuga For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man and toddler are shot dead in Facebook on Facebook Live in Chicago | Metro News
text:
Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 3:03 pm 
Warning: Distressing footage The toddler was in the back seat Picture: Fox News) 
A two-year-old was shot dead during a Facebook Live video. 
The heart-breaking clip showed a woman shouting ‘They killed him… I have a bullet in my stomach’ as she ran into a house to take shelter after Lavontay White Jr had been hit. 
The 20-year-old woman had been singing with her boyfriend in a car when they were ambushed in Chicago on Tuesday. 
Her boyfriend, 26, who was also killed, was Lavontay’s uncle. 
They were both shot in the head, according to the Chicago Tribune. 
The woman told police they were blocked in before a man opened fire in South Kenneth Avenue after getting out of the car. 
The distraught victim, who is four months pregnant, was rushed to hospital and police confirmed her and her baby were in a stable condition. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video Lavontay White Jr was only two years old (Picture: Facebook) Police are investigating the murders (Picture: Getty Images) 
Authorities added Lavontay’s uncle was the probable target and was a gang member. 
It was the second shooting to involve a child on the day, with 12-year-old Kanari Gentry Bowers also being seriously injured. She is currently on life support in hospital. 
Another child, Takiya Holmes, 11, also died on Tuesday from gunshot wounds sustained on Saturday. Police look over a bullet-riddled car after a gunman opened fire killing a two-year-old child Picture: Getty Images) 
‘These shootings must be a turning point for our city,’ said Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel. 
‘Anyone with information about these crimes owes it to the families of these children to come forward.’ 
The pregnant woman and her dead boyfriend have not been named.
